enchantment.wonderful_enchantments.fishi: Gives a chance to catch an additional items from fishing.
Gives a chance to catch an additional items from fishing.
wonderful_enchantments.fanatic_level_up: You have become greater Fishing Fanatic!
enchantment.wonderful_enchantments.human: Increases the damage against villagers, pillagers, witches and other players.
Increases the damage against villagers, pillagers, witches and other players.
enchantment.wonderful_enchantments.dodge: Gives a chance to completely avoid any kind of damage.
Gives a chance to completely avoid any kind of damage.
enchantment.wonderful_enchantments.enlig: Increases the experience gained from any source.
Increases the experience gained from any source.
enchantment.wonderful_enchantments.phoen: Fall from a height causes the release of a wave of fire which damages and sets nearby enemies on fire. Also while you hold the sneak key (def. SHIFT) you will jump higher!
Fall from a height causes the release of a wave of fire which damages and sets nearby enemies on fire. Also while you hold the sneak key (def. SHIFT) you will jump higher!
enchantment.wonderful_enchantments.puffe: Every attack will inflict on target several debuffs.
Every attack will inflict on target several debuffs.
enchantment.wonderful_enchantments.immor: You will cheat death on fatal hit.
You will cheat death on fatal hit.
enchantment.wonderful_enchantments.smelt: Gives a chance to smelt a block when destroyed.
Gives a chance to smelt a block when destroyed.
enchantment.wonderful_enchantments.gotta: Increases the digging speed the longer you hold the left mouse button.
Increases the digging speed the longer you hold the left mouse button.
enchantment.wonderful_enchantments.leech: Gives a chance to steal positive effects or health from opponents.
Gives a chance to steal positive effects or health from opponents.
enchantment.wonderful_enchantments.magic: Protects against magical damage like Evoker Fangs, Guardian laser and Instant Damage potion.
Protects against magical damage like Evoker Fangs, Guardian laser and Instant Damage potion.
enchantment.wonderful_enchantments.horse: Reduces the amount of damage received by the horse.
Reduces the amount of damage received by the horse.
